methods.name: public Builder setSsid(@NonNull byte[] ssid)
methods.comment:
* Set the SSID, in the form of a raw byte array.
         * @see WifiInfo#getSSID()

methods.name: public Builder setApMldMacAddress(@Nullable MacAddress address)
methods.comment:
* Set the AP MLD (Multi-Link Device) MAC Address.
         * @see WifiInfo#getApMldMacAddress()
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setApMloLinkId(int linkId)
methods.comment:
* Set the access point Multi-Link Operation (MLO) link-id.
         * @see WifiInfo#getApMloLinkId()
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setAffiliatedMloLinks(@NonNull List<MloLink> links)
methods.comment:
* Set the Multi-Link Operation (MLO) affiliated Links.
         * Only applicable for Wi-Fi 7 access points.
         * @see WifiInfo#getAffiliatedMloLinks()
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setRssi(int rssi)
methods.comment:
* Set the RSSI, in dBm.
         * @see WifiInfo#getRssi()

methods.name: public Builder setCurrentSecurityType(@WifiConfiguration.SecurityType int securityType)
methods.comment:
* Set the current security type
         * @see WifiInfo#getCurrentSecurityType()

methods.name: public Builder enableApTidToLinkMappingNegotiationSupport(boolean enable)
